question:
Match the columns:
(A) Australia 1. Pretoria
(B) Canada 2. Riyadh
(C) South Africa 3. Canberra
(D) Saudi Arabia 4. Ottawa
     A B C D
explanation:
• Pretoria is an administrative capital of South Africa.
• Riyadh is the capital of Saudi Arabia and Riyadh Province. It is the largest city in Saudi Arabia and one of the most populated cities in the Arab world.
• Canberra is the capital city of Australia. Founded following the federation of the colonies of Australia as the seat of government for the new nation.
• Ottawa is the capital city of Canada. It stands on the south bank of the Ottawa River in the eastern portion of southern Ontario.
